name: 斩毒：罪与罚（Narcotics Police:Crime And Punish)
name_original: 斩毒：罪与罚（Narcotics Police:Crime And Punish)
description:
"Narcotics Police:Crime And Punish"
In a dark, we were called by a mysterious force. In order to escape this darkness, we started a exploration and adventure.
Tour the entire scene, check various documents, collect information, and explore the truth. Find a way out
This is a first -person perspective to explore the game. You need to explore the entire map and collect and view various text information, picture information, and item information. And fight against the power of darkness. To restore this information out of the truth, the truth is revealed, and you can see the ending of the entire story.
